name: Emilia: Lost in the woods
description:
Emilia: Lost in the woods (v 0.1)

Help Emilia to get out of the forest. Control the forest spirits to guide her through the woods.

Game made for Fantasy Console Game Jam #2 (https://itch.io/jam/fantasy-console-game-jam-2) for the Pix64 Console

How to Play:

1. Download Pix64 here: https://zappedcow.itch.io/pix64
2. Download and extract the files in the "/Carts" folder of the Pix64 console.
3. Execute Pix64.exe and enjoy!

Controls:

Movement: W-A-S-D / Arrows
Restart level: R
Exit: Esc

Credits to ZappedCow, for the Pix64 Console, go check it out!
